full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Canadian Government Tender

**Publication Title - Titre de Publication**
Phase 2 - Workshops Washroom Renovation - [Victoria, British Columbia]

**Reference Number**
WS4318610857-Doc4367631543

**Publication Date**
2023-12-22

**Tender Closing Date**
2024-01-17T14:00:00

**Contract Summary**

Departement de Pêches et Océans (MPO) / Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) invites qualified contractors to bid on the Workshops Washroom Renovation project in Victoria, British Columbia. 

The procurement contract involves the renovation of washrooms at the DFO's workshop in Victoria. 

**Key Details**
- **Contract Category**: Specialized public building construction services (UNSPSC: 72121400) and Plumbing construction services (UNSPSC: 72151100)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
- **End User Entity**: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) / Ministère des Pêches et des Océans (MPO)

**Contact Information**
Name: Leung, Janie (elle-la / she-her)
Email: [janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Please note that the tender has been cancelled due to no modifications on the tender status.

#### Cancellation Description
This contract has been cancelled due to no modifications on the tender status.
